attributes.action: stop the increase in car tax that will hurt larger and poorer familys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if any family is more than 5 people then they must have a car that fits everyone in, so the goverment are taxing familys for being road legal. it will hit poorer familys and be an extra cost for anyone using the car for work so affectively reducing the amount of earnings and also leaving anyone with a mpv with a worthless car.
